parameters.name: Subscriptions
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
| project subscriptionId, name
| order by name asc

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| summarize ['Usage Start']=min(todatetime(Date_s)), ['Usage End']=max(todatetime(Date_s))
| extend ['Usage Days'] = toint(format_timespan(['Usage End']-['Usage Start'],'d'))

content.json: Only Block Blob storage usage is presented (Files, Queues, Page Blobs, etc. are not included). Costs are presented at the on-demand price, i.e., as if no Storage reservations were applied to usage.

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| extend StorageOffer = iif(MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob', 'Standard v1', iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium', 'Premium', 'Standard v2'))
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by StorageOffer
content.title: Storage Offers ({Currency:value})

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| extend FileStructure = iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace', 'HNS', 'Flat')
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by FileStructure
content.title: File Structure ({Currency:value})

content.query:
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| join kind=inner (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by Replication
content.title: Replication ({Currency:value})

content.query:
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
let StorageSize = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| summarize SizeGB=sum(todouble(Quantity_s)) by ResourceId, Date_s
| summarize arg_max(todatetime(Date_s), SizeGB) by ResourceId
| project SizeGB=round(SizeGB*30), ResourceId;
let StorageTransactions = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterName_s has 'Operations'
| summarize Transactions=round(sum(todouble(Quantity_s))*10000) by ResourceId;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| extend StorageOffer = iif(MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob', 'Standard v1', iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium', 'Premium', 'Standard v2'))
| join kind=leftouter (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageSize) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageTransactions) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| extend FileStructure = iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace', 'HNS', 'Flat')
| summarize ['Cost ({Currency:value})']=round(sum(FullCost)) by ['Storage Account']=ResourceId, Offer=StorageOffer, ['File Structure']=FileStructure, Replication, ['Size (GB)']=SizeGB, Transactions
| order by ['Cost ({Currency:value})']
content.title: Storage Accounts List

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| extend FileStructure = iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace', 'HNS', 'Flat')
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by FileStructure
content.title: File Structure ({Currency:value})

content.query:
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| join kind=inner (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by Replication
content.title: Replication ({Currency:value})

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored' and (MeterName_s has 'Hot' or MeterName_s has 'Cool' or MeterName_s has 'Archive')
| extend Tier = iif(MeterName_s has 'Hot', 'Hot', iif(MeterName_s has 'Cool', 'Cool', 'Archive'))
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by Tier
content.title: Data Stored Tiering ({Currency:value})

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Operations' and (MeterName_s has 'Hot' or MeterName_s has 'Cool' or MeterName_s has 'Archive')
| extend Tier = iif(MeterName_s has 'Hot', 'Hot', iif(MeterName_s has 'Cool', 'Cool', 'Archive'))
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by Tier
content.title: Transactions Tiering ({Currency:value})

parameters.name: Hot2CoolTarget
parameters.label: Hot to Cool Target (%)
parameters.description: The % of Hot data estimated to be moved to Cool with LCM

parameters.name: MoveToHotThreshold
parameters.label: Trans. Move to Hot (%)
parameters.description: The max. % of transactions costs vs. total costs and of Cool transactions costs vs. total transactions costs

parameters.name: ErrorMargin
parameters.label: Comfort Margin (%)
parameters.description: The comfort margin (%) for estimation errors (difference between Enable vs. Maybe LCM)

content.json: Enable Lifecycle Management recommendations may not apply when there is a very large object count to be moved to cooler tiers. Each object moved to a cooler tier will trigger a SetBlobTier transaction billed at Cool Write Operations pricing. Please review the blob count metrics and estimate Lifecycle Management operations costs before applying the recommendation. See more details [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/storage/blobs/access-tiers-overview#changing-a-blobs-access-tier). For pricing, check [here](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/storage/blobs/).

content.query:
let MoveToHotThreshold = todouble({MoveToHotThreshold})/100;
let Hot2CoolPercentage = todouble({Hot2CoolTarget})/100;
let ErrorMarginPercentage = todouble({ErrorMargin})/100;
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
let StorageSize = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize SizeGB=sum(todouble(Quantity_s)), CostStored=sum(FullCost) by ResourceId, Date_s
| summarize arg_max(todatetime(Date_s), SizeGB), CostStored=round(sum(CostStored)) by ResourceId
| project SizeGB=round(SizeGB*30), CostStored, ResourceId;
let StorageTransactions = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Operations'
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Transactions=round(sum(todouble(Quantity_s))*10000), TransactionsCost=round(sum(FullCost)) by ResourceId;
let HotStorageSize = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored' and MeterName_s has 'Hot'
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize HotSizeCost=round(sum(FullCost)) by ResourceId;
let HotTransactions = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Operations' and (MeterName_s has 'Hot' or MeterName_s has 'List and Create Container' or MeterName_s has 'All Other')
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize HotTransactions=round(sum(todouble(Quantity_s))*10000), HotTransactionsCost=round(sum(FullCost)) by ResourceId;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s !has 'Premium' and MeterSubCategory_s != 'General Block Blob'
| join kind=leftouter (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageSize) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageTransactions) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (HotStorageSize) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (HotTransactions) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| extend FileStructure = iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace', 'HNS', 'Flat')
| summarize TotalCost=round(sum(FullCost)) by ['Storage Account']=ResourceId, Structure=FileStructure, Replication, ['Size (GB)']=SizeGB, CostStored, HotSizeCost, Transactions, TransactionsCost, HotTransactionsCost
| extend TransactionsFactor = round(TransactionsCost/TotalCost,1)
| extend HotTransactionsFactor = round(HotTransactionsCost/TransactionsCost,1)
| extend CostStored = iif(isnotempty(CostStored), CostStored, 0.0)
| extend HotSizeCost = iif(isnotempty(HotSizeCost), HotSizeCost, 0.0)
| extend TransactionsCost = iif(isnotempty(TransactionsCost), TransactionsCost, 0.0)
| extend HotTransactionsCost = iif(isnotempty(HotTransactionsCost), HotTransactionsCost, 0.0)
| extend EstimatedSavings = round(HotSizeCost*Hot2CoolPercentage/2-HotTransactionsCost*Hot2CoolPercentage*2)
| extend EstimatedSavingsWithError = round(HotSizeCost*Hot2CoolPercentage/2*(1-ErrorMarginPercentage)-HotTransactionsCost*Hot2CoolPercentage*2)*(1+ErrorMarginPercentage)
| extend Recommendation = iif(TransactionsFactor > MoveToHotThreshold and HotTransactionsFactor < MoveToHotThreshold, 'Move to Hot', iif(EstimatedSavingsWithError > 0, 'Enable LCM', iif(EstimatedSavings > 0, 'Maybe LCM', 'No tier change')))
| extend EstimatedSavings = iif(Recommendation != 'Move to Hot', EstimatedSavings, round((TransactionsCost-HotTransactionsCost)/2-(CostStored-HotSizeCost)*2))
| extend Recommendation = iif(Recommendation != 'No tier change' and EstimatedSavings <= 0, 'No tier change', Recommendation)
| project-away HotTransactionsFactor, TransactionsFactor, EstimatedSavingsWithError
| order by TotalCost
| project-rename ['Total ({Currency})']=TotalCost, ['Size ({Currency})']=CostStored, ['Hot Size ({Currency})']=HotSizeCost, ['Trans. ({Currency})']=TransactionsCost, ['Hot Trans. ({Currency})']=HotTransactionsCost, ['Savings ({Currency})']=EstimatedSavings
content.title: Storage Accounts List

content.query:
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob'
| join kind=inner (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by Replication
content.title: Replication ({Currency:value})

content.query:
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
let StorageSize = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| summarize SizeGB=sum(todouble(Quantity_s)) by ResourceId, Date_s
| summarize arg_max(todatetime(Date_s), SizeGB) by ResourceId
| project SizeGB=round(SizeGB*30), ResourceId;
let StorageTransactions = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob'
| where MeterName_s has 'Operations'
| summarize Transactions=round(sum(todouble(Quantity_s))*10000) by ResourceId;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s == 'General Block Blob'
| join kind=leftouter (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageSize) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageTransactions) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize ['Cost ({Currency:value})']=round(sum(FullCost)) by ['Storage Account']=ResourceId, Replication, ['Size (GB)']=SizeGB, Transactions
| order by ['Cost ({Currency:value})']
content.title: Storage Accounts List

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium'
| extend FileStructure = iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace', 'HNS', 'Flat')
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by FileStructure
content.title: File Structure ({Currency:value})

content.query:
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium'
| join kind=inner (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| summarize Cost=sum(FullCost) by Replication

content.query:
let StorageReplication = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| extend Replication = tostring(split(MeterName_s, ' ')[-3])
| distinct ResourceId, Replication;
let StorageSize = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium'
| where MeterName_s has 'Data Stored'
| summarize SizeGB=sum(todouble(Quantity_s)) by ResourceId, Date_s
| summarize arg_max(todatetime(Date_s), SizeGB) by ResourceId
| project SizeGB=round(SizeGB*30), ResourceId;
let StorageTransactions = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium'
| where MeterName_s has 'Operations'
| summarize Transactions=round(sum(todouble(Quantity_s))*10000) by ResourceId;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where todatetime(Date_s) between (todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:startISO}')..todatetime('{LookbackPeriod:endISO}'))
| where SubscriptionId in ({Subscriptions:value})
| where MeterCategory_s == 'Storage' and (MeterSubCategory_s has 'Block Blob' or MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace')
| where ResourceId has 'microsoft.storage' or ResourceId has 'microsoft.classicstorage'
| where MeterSubCategory_s has 'Premium'
| join kind=leftouter (StorageReplication) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageSize) on ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (StorageTransactions) on ResourceId
| extend FullCost = todouble(Quantity_s) * todouble(UnitPrice_s)
| extend FileStructure = iif(MeterSubCategory_s has 'Hierarchical Namespace', 'HNS', 'Flat')
| summarize ['Cost ({Currency:value})']=round(sum(FullCost)) by ['Storage Account']=ResourceId, ['File Structure']=FileStructure, Replication, ['Size (GB)']=SizeGB, Transactions
| order by ['Cost ({Currency:value})']
content.title: Storage Accounts List
